Package core

Class Connect4ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
core.Player
core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
public class Connect4ComputerPlayer
extends Player
Class Defines the template for the Connect4 CPU/AI Object. Extension that inherits from the Player class.
